actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the location of U.S. servicemen missing in action in the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the United Nations should adopt a resolution calling upon the Government of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam to honor the humanitarian obligations of the Paris Agreement signed on January 27, 1973 and the joint communique signed June 13, 1973.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the location of U.S. servicemen missing in action in the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.
